title: Walk reminder
description: A simple yet effective Chrome extension designed for developers and desk workers to promote regular movement and well-being during long hours at the computer.

title: Travel Assistant
description: Built an example personal AI travel assistant

title: Musicport
description: A music app that allows port music from one streaming platform to another. Server for frontend was built from scratch without reliance on Frameworks. It was de-commisioned but source code is still available

title: StyleX inspired atomic css
description: Inspired by Meta's stylex css library, I built a quick example of an atomic css library from scratch with codesandbox. It is super lightweight but yet powerful

title: js-docusaurus
description: Opinionated comment analyzer for Javascript and Typescript projects

title: Javico
description: Collaborate on code, share the link and get instant code reviews from others

title: Kunyora
description: A flexible and disposable Rest Client for Javascript applications. This Javacsript library also includes React extension
